content:
TITLE: Retrieving Receivables Documents in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Fetches a list of accounts receivable documents (invoices, quotes, credit notes) with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination support.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_181

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing and Using MoniteClient
DESCRIPTION: Example of instantiating the Monite client and making a basic API call to create a product.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { MoniteClient } from "@monite/node-client";

const client = new MoniteClient({
    token: "YOUR_TOKEN",
    moniteVersion: "YOUR_MONITE_VERSION",
    moniteEntityId: "YOUR_MONITE_ENTITY_ID",
});
await client.products.create({
    name: "name",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating an Entity in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new entity with the specified parameters including address, email, and type. This method establishes a new entity in the system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_43

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.entities.create({
    address: {
        city: "city",
        country: "AF",
        line1: "line1",
        postal_code: "postal_code",
    },
    email: "email",
    type: "individual",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Payable in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Add a new payable by providing the amount, currency, vendor name, and other details. You can provide the base64_encoded contents of the original invoice file in the field `base64_encoded_file`.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_131

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.create();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Payables in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Lists all payables from the connected entity. Payables are financial documents given by an entity's supplier itemizing the purchase of a good or service and demanding payment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_130

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Receivable Document in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new receivable document with counterpart information, currency, and line items. The example shows creation of a quote document.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_182

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.create({
    counterpart_billing_address_id: "counterpart_billing_address_id",
    counterpart_id: "counterpart_id",
    currency: "AED",
    line_items: [
        {
            quantity: 1.1,
        },
    ],
    type: "quote",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Counterparts in Monite API
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new counterpart in the system. This example creates an individual counterpart with address information and specifies if they are a customer, vendor, or both.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_23

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.create({
    type: "individual",
    individual: {
        address: {
            city: "Berlin",
            country: "AF",
            line1: "Flughafenstrasse 52",
            postal_code: "10115",
        },
        first_name: "Adnan",
        is_customer: true,
        is_vendor: true,
        last_name: "Singh",
    },
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Payment Record in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new payment record with specified amount, currency, and object details. Returns a PaymentRecordResponse object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_159

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.paymentRecords.create({
    amount: 1,
    currency: "AED",
    object: {
        id: "id",
        type: "receivable",
    },
    paid_at: "2024-01-15T09:30:00Z",
    payment_intent_id: "payment_intent_id",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Canceling Payable by ID in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Cancels the payable that was not confirmed during the review using the Monite Node client.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_143

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.cancelById("payable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating an Entity by ID in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Updates specified fields of an entity with provided values. Requires the entity ID and update parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_47

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.entities.updateById("ea837e28-509b-4b6a-a600-d54b6aa0b1f5", {});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Marking a Receivable as Paid in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Marks a receivable document as fully paid. Requires a valid receivable ID parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_198

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.markAsPaidById("receivable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating an Approval Policy in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new approval policy with specified name, description, and script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.approvalPolicies.create({
    name: "name",
    description: "description",
    script: [true],
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rejecting Payable by ID in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Declines the payable when an approver finds any mismatch or discrepancies using the Monite Node client.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_147

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.rejectById("payable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Payable Invoice by ID in TypeScript using Monite SDK
DESCRIPTION: Fetches information about an individual payable invoice (bill) from the entity's accounting system using its ID. The payable may or may not also exist in Monite.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_239

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.accounting.payables.getById("payable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Customizing the Fetch Client
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to provide a custom fetch implementation for environments not natively supported by the SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { MoniteClient } from "@monite/node-client";

const client = new MoniteClient({
    ...
    fetcher: // provide your implementation here
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Reopening a Payable by ID in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Resets a payable's state from rejected to new. This method requires the payable ID as a parameter and returns a PayableResponseSchema object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_148

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.reopenById("payable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Payment Link in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new payment link with specified payment methods and recipient details. Returns a PublicPaymentLinkResponse object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_155

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.paymentLinks.create({
    payment_methods: ["sepa_credit"],
    recipient: {
        id: "id",
        type: "entity",
    },
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Payment Intents in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Fetches a list of payment intents based on optional parameters. Returns a PaymentIntentsListResponse object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_151

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.paymentIntents.get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating an Access Token in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new access token based on client ID and client secret using the client credentials grant type.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.accessTokens.create({
    client_id: "client_id",
    client_secret: "client_secret",
    grant_type: "client_credentials",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Products in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new product with specified name. Requires at minimum a name property in the request payload.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_172

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.products.create({
    name: "name",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Validating a Payable by ID in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Checks if a payable meets requirements to move from draft to new status. This method requires the payable ID as a parameter and returns a PayableValidationResponse object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_150

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.validateById("payable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Handling API Exceptions
DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to catch and handle errors thrown by the Monite API when non-success status codes are returned.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { MoniteError } from "@monite/node-client";

try {
    await client.products.create(...);
} catch (err) {
    if (err instanceof MoniteError) {
        console.log(err.statusCode);
        console.log(err.message);
        console.log(err.body);
    }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Monite TypeScript Client
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Monite TypeScript client library via npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm i -s @monite/node-client
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Batch Payments in Monite API
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new batch payment with specified payer bank account and payment intents. Each payment intent must include an object with ID and type, and a recipient with ID and type.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.batchPayments.create({
    payer_bank_account_id: "payer_bank_account_id",
    payment_intents: [
        {
            object: {
                id: "id",
                type: "payable",
            },
            recipient: {
                id: "id",
                type: "counterpart",
            },
        },
    ],
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Products in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Fetches all products available for the entity. No additional parameters are required.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_171

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.products.get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Line Items for a Receivable in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Replaces all line items of an existing invoice or quote with a new list of line items. Requires a receivable ID and data object with line items information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_195

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.updateLineItemsById("receivable_id", {
    data: [
        {
            quantity: 1.1,
        },
    ],
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Purchase Orders in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Gets a list of purchase orders. This method accepts optional parameters for filtering and pagination.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_122

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.purchaseOrders.get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sending a Receivable in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Sends a receivable document to the recipient with custom body and subject text. Requires a receivable ID and text content for body and subject.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_203

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.sendById("receivable_id", {
    body_text: "body_text",
    subject_text: "subject_text",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Submitting a Payable for Approval in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Starts the approval process for a validated payable. This method requires the payable ID as a parameter and returns a PayableResponseSchema object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_149

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.submitForApprovalById("payable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Analytics for Payables in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Retrieves aggregated statistics for payables with specified metric and aggregation function.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.analytics.getAnalyticsPayables({
    metric: "id",
    aggregation_function: "count",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving a Receivable by ID in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Fetches a specific receivable document using its unique identifier.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_184

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.getById("receivable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Managing Counterpart Contacts in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Code examples for retrieving, creating, and managing contacts associated with counterparts. These snippets demonstrate contact listing, creation with address details, retrieval, deletion, updating, and making a contact the default.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_267

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.contacts.get("counterpart_id");
```

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.contacts.create("counterpart_id", {
    address: {
        city: "Berlin",
        country: "AF",
        line1: "Flughafenstrasse 52",
        postal_code: "10115",
    },
    first_name: "Mary",
    last_name: "O'Brien",
});
```

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.contacts.getById("contact_id", "counterpart_id");
```

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.contacts.deleteById("contact_id", "counterpart_id");
```

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.contacts.updateById("contact_id", "counterpart_id");
```

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.contacts.makeDefaultById("contact_id", "counterpart_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Managing Counterpart Bank Accounts in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Code examples for deleting, updating, and setting default bank accounts for counterparts. These snippets demonstrate how to use the BankAccounts API methods with the required bankAccountId and counterpartId parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_266

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.bankAccounts.deleteById("bank_account_id", "counterpart_id");
```

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.bankAccounts.updateById("bank_account_id", "counterpart_id");
```

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.bankAccounts.makeDefaultById("bank_account_id", "counterpart_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Approval Policies in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Retrieves a list of all approval policies with pagination.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.approvalPolicies.get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Accepting a Receivable by ID in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Marks a receivable document (typically a quote) as accepted by the counterpart.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_187

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.acceptById("receivable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Getting Counterparts in Monite API
DESCRIPTION: Retrieves a paginated list of counterparts with optional filtering. This example shows filtering by sort code, returning a CounterpartPaginationResponse.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_22

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.counterparts.get({
    sort_code: "123456",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Entity Bank Account in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new bank account for an entity using the Monite client's entities.bankAccounts.create method. Requires country and currency parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_275

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.entities.bankAccounts.create({
    country: "AF",
    currency: "AED",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Entity User by ID in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Updates specified fields of an entity user with provided values. Requires entityUserId and UpdateEntityUserRequest parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_67

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.entityUsers.updateById("entity_user_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Marking a Receivable as Uncollectible in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Marks a receivable document as uncollectible. Requires a valid receivable ID parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_200

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.markAsUncollectibleById("receivable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Bank Account Verification in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Initiates the verification process for a bank account using the Monite client's entities.bankAccounts.startVerification method.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_277

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.entities.bankAccounts.startVerification({
    airwallex_plaid: {
        client_name: "client_name",
        redirect_url: "redirect_url",
    },
    type: "airwallex_plaid",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Payables Analytics in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Retrieve aggregated statistics for payables, including total amount and count, both overall and by status.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_132

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.getAnalytics();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Current Entity in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Updates information about the entity to which the current entity user belongs. Requires UpdateEntityRequest parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_63

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.entityUsers.updateCurrentEntity({});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating a Payment Intent by ID in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Updates details of an existing payment intent using its ID and provided parameters. Returns a PaymentIntentResponse object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_153

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.paymentIntents.updateById("payment_intent_id", {
    amount: 1,
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Verifying a Receivable in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Verifies a receivable document for correctness. Requires a valid receivable ID parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_205

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.verifyById("receivable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Ledger Accounts in Monite API (TypeScript)
DESCRIPTION: Fetches all ledger accounts using the accounting API. This method returns a LedgerAccountListResponse containing all available ledger accounts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_252

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.accounting.ledgerAccounts.get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Fetching Payable by ID in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Retrieves information about a specific payable with the given ID using the Monite Node client.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_138

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.getById("payable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning a Receivable by ID in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a duplicate of an existing receivable document, useful for creating similar documents without manual re-entry.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_189

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.cloneById("receivable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Entity User in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new entity user with specified values. Requires user details like first name and login.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_59

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.entityUsers.create({
    first_name: "Casey",
    login: "login",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Issuing a Receivable by ID in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Issues a receivable document by its ID. Requires a valid receivable ID string parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_194

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.receivables.issueById("receivable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Recurrence in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new recurrence configuration for invoices. Requires specifications for recurrence period, start/end dates, and invoice ID.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_207

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.recurrences.create({
    day_of_month: "first_day",
    end_month: 1,
    end_year: 1,
    invoice_id: "invoice_id",
    start_month: 1,
    start_year: 1,
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Uploading Payable from File in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Upload an incoming invoice (payable) in PDF, PNG, JPEG, or TIFF format and scan its contents. The maximum file size is 10MB.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_133

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.uploadFromFile(fs.createReadStream("/path/to/your/file"));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Payable by ID in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Updates the information about a specific payable using the Monite Node client.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_140

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.payables.updateById("payable_id");
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Payment Terms in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Creates a new payment term with specified name and term_final settings. The term_final setting includes the number of days for the payment term.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_167

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.paymentTerms.create({
    name: "name",
    term_final: {
        number_of_days: 1,
    },
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Uploading File in Monite Node Client
DESCRIPTION: Uploads a file to the Monite system. Requires a file stream and upload parameters including file_type.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_71

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await client.files.upload(fs.createReadStream("/path/to/your/file"), {
    file_type: "ocr_results",
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Marking Payable as Partially Paid in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Marks a payable as partially paid using the Monite Node client. This can be used multiple times to reflect multiple partial payments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/team-monite/monite-node-client/blob/main/reference.md#2025-04-23_snippet_146

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
